mapper.select: SELECT ro.* from sys_role ro left join sys_user_role ur on (ro.ROLEID = ur.ROLEID) left join sys_user us on (us.USERID = ur.USERID) where us.USERNAME = #{userName}

SELECT ro.ROLEID, ro.ROLENAME, ro.ROLEDESC, GROUP_CONCAT(ur.MENUID) menuIds, GROUP_CONCAT(sm.MENUNAME) menuNames from sys_role ro left join sys_role_menu ur on (ro.ROLEID = ur.ROLEID) left join sys_menu sm on (ur.MENUID = sm.MENUID) group by ro.ROLEID, ro.ROLENAME, ro.ROLEDESC
SELECT sm.* from sys_role ro inner join sys_role_menu ur on (ro.ROLEID = ur.ROLEID) inner join sys_menu sm on (ur.MENUID = sm.MENUID) where ro.ROLEID=#{roleId}
